alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:09PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson County through 545 PM MDT... At 509 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles north of Long Valley, or 22 miles south of Kadoka, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Jackson County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
